entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
